title: New: Callum Pitt – Happiness
content:
Photo: Daniel Stark

Newcastle’s Callum Pitt again showcases his songwriting prowess yet again on latest single, Happiness.

His fourth original track, there’s an almost Beach Boys swing to it, and quite possibly his finest moment yet lyrically, ending on the hauntingly poignant line, “Come on around, clear these dust clouds / Cause the days too short to wish away or undersell the words you say”. Another rousing addition to his flourishing collection of tracks. Check it out below.
